name: Exertus Redux
overview: Exertus: Redux is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics Exertus is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics. Through use of the fluid movement set within the game and the dynamic level elements, players have the simple aim of getting from point A to point B, either by using the beaten path or the off-path environment in the semi-linear levels.
